languages.text: "Истина проста. Ты — Вольный Торговец. Я — агент Золотого Трона. Мы служим Империуму, но наша служба рано или поздно перечеркнет то, что происходит между нами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас в упор.{/n} "Истина проста. Ты — Вольный Торговец. Я — агент Золотого Трона. Мы служим Империуму, но наша служба рано или поздно перечеркнет то, что происходит между нами".

languages.text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."
languages.original_text: "Истина проста. Ты — Вольный Торговец. Я — агент Золотого Трона. Мы служим Империуму, но наша служба рано или поздно перечеркнет то, что происходит между нами".

traits.locale_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."
"The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."
"The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."
"The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."

languages.text: “事情很简单。你是行商浪人，而我是黄金王座的代理人。我们都为帝国服务，但我们的职责迟早会让我们之间爆发冲突。”
languages.original_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."

traits.locale_text: “事情很简单。你是行商浪人，而我是黄金王座的代理人。我们都为帝国服务，但我们的职责迟早会让我们之间爆发冲突。”

languages.text: «La verdad es sencilla. Usted es Comerciante Independiente y yo sirvo al Trono Dorado. Aunque ambos servimos al Imperium, nuestros deberes terminarán por interponerse tarde o temprano».
languages.original_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad es sencilla. Usted es Comerciante Independiente y yo sirvo al Trono Dorado. Aunque ambos servimos al Imperium, nuestros deberes terminarán por interponerse tarde o temprano».

languages.text: 「真実は簡単だ。あなたは自由開拓者。俺は黄金の玉座のエージェントだ。我々は帝国に仕えてはいるが、遅かれ早かれ我々の間には義務が生じる」
languages.original_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."

traits.locale_text: 「真実は簡単だ。あなたは自由開拓者。俺は黄金の玉座のエージェントだ。我々は帝国に仕えてはいるが、遅かれ早かれ我々の間には義務が生じる」

languages.text: « La vérité est on ne peut plus simple : vous êtes une libre-marchande, je suis un agent du Trône d'Or. Nous servons tous deux l'Imperium, mais tôt ou tard, notre devoir deviendra un obstacle. »
languages.original_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité est on ne peut plus simple : vous êtes une libre-marchande, je suis un agent du Trône d'Or. Nous servons tous deux l'Imperium, mais tôt ou tard, notre devoir deviendra un obstacle. »

languages.text: "Die Wahrheit ist einfach. Ihr seid {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich bin Agent des Goldenen Throns. Wir dienen dem Imperium, aber früher oder später wird unsere Pflicht zwischen uns stehen."
languages.original_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wahrheit ist einfach. Ihr seid {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich bin Agent des Goldenen Throns. Wir dienen dem Imperium, aber früher oder später wird unsere Pflicht zwischen uns stehen."

languages.text: "Hakikat ortada. Sen bir Hür Tacirsin. Ben de Altın Taht'ın bir ajanıyım. İmparatorluk'a hizmet ediyoruz fakat eninde sonunda vazifelerimiz aramıza girecek."
languages.original_text: "The truth is simple. You are a Rogue Trader. I am an agent of the Golden Throne. We serve the Imperium, but sooner or later, our duty will come between us."
